betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThere is a recipe to make an unbreakable version of the Alienist's Stone that can be used for automation.

§fOne question is answered, but another still persists. 
The properties of Runandium can be awakened through another art, Thaumaturgy. It is thanks to it that its full ptential can shine. And what a potential! I think I am starting to understand why runes may be interesting.
And yet, Runandor actively ignores it. Why? Wouldn't they want to make use of it, especially with the Shyre Empire's pressures around power and its use?
This intentionality stinks of hidden history. Something in Runandor's past led to this situation. It has to! There is no way the people here are just blind to it!
